exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce comp_mono to an evaluable reference.

exceptions.tactic: intros H1 H2 x y H.
intros H1' H2 x y H.
intros H1' H2 x y H'.

exceptions.exn: In environment P : forall T1 T2 : poset, (T1 -> T2) -> Prop S1, S2, T1, T2 : poset f1 : S1 -> T1 f2 : S2 -> T2 H : monotone f1 H0 : monotone f2 H1 : P T2 T2 id -> P T2 T2 id -> P T2 T2 (id \\o id) Unable to unify "P T2 T2 (id \\o id)" with "P (pairPoset S1 S2) (pairPoset T1 T2) (f1 \\* f2)".

In environment P0, P : forall T1 T2 : poset, (T1 -> T2) -> Prop S1, S2, T1, T2 : poset f1 : S1 -> T1 f2 : S2 -> T2 H : monotone f1 H0 : monotone f2 H2 : P0 T2 T2 id -> P0 T2 T2 id -> P0 T2 T2 (id \\o id) H1 : P T2 T2 id -> P T2 T2 (id \\o id) Unable to unify "P0 T2 T2 (id \\o id)" with "P (pairPoset S1 S2) (pairPoset T1 T2) (f1 \\* f2)".

In environment P1, P0, P : forall T1 T2 : poset, (T1 -> T2) -> Prop S1, S2, T1, T2 : poset f1 : S1 -> T1 f2 : S2 -> T2 H : monotone f1 H0 : monotone f2 H1 : P T2 T2 id -> P T2 T2 (id \\o id) H3 : P1 T2 T2 id -> P1 T2 T2 id -> P1 T2 T2 (id \\o id) H2 : P0 T2 T2 id -> P0 T2 T2 (id \\o id) Unable to unify "monotone f1" with "P (pairPoset S1 S2) (pairPoset T1 T2) (f1 \\* f2)".

original: intros. unfold monotone, comp_mono in *. intros H1 H2 x y H. apply H1. apply H2. apply H.
